content: I'll definitely check out some of those podcasts and audiobooks. I've been enjoying listening to podcasts on my daily commute, and it would be great to learn more about my own community. By the way, do you have any recommendations for local events or meetups that focus on sustainable living, community development, or local history? I've been meeting up with an old friend at a bookstore, and it's been great to discuss these topics with someone who shares my interests.
